about_the_game:
Step into the strategic depths of a World War II-inspired universe where countryballs rule. In this turn-based grand strategy game, you will manage resources, forge alliances, build your empire, and rewrite history with a blend of comedic countryball charm and serious tactical depth. Whether you are new to strategy games or a seasoned veteran, prepare to shape the fate of the world in a playful, challenging way.

KEY FEATURES

TURN-BASED GRAND STRATEGY

Plan and execute your actions one move at a time. Adapt to changing situations on the battlefield and in diplomacy as you guide your countryball to supremacy.

DEEP CHARACTER PROGRESSION

Level up your main countryball with new skills and perks. Hire legendary generals, train specialized soldiers, and equip them with powerful items for an edge in combat.

NATION BUILDING & MANAGEMENT

Construct buildings to strengthen your territories. Manage resources, oversee production, and grow your economy for long-term stability.

WWII-ERA DIPLOMACY & FACTIONS

Experience historical inspiration from the World War II era, infused with countryball humor. Negotiate treaties, form alliances, or join existing factions to protect your interests.

MILITARY POWER AT YOUR COMMAND

Recruit and train tanks, planes, and infantry units. Organize large-scale campaigns to conquer enemy lands or support your allies in epic battles.

CUSTOM COUNTRYBALL EDITOR

Create and personalize your own countryball by drawing a custom flag. Show off your artistic side and stand out on the battlefield.

RICH WORLD MAP & SCENARIOS

Explore diverse regions, each with unique advantages and challenges. Encounter dynamic events that will put your leadership and strategic thinking to the test.

FUN MINIGAMES FOR TRAINING

Play engaging minigames to train and improve your countryball, boosting its performance in battle and beyond.

MULTIPLE CAMPAIGNS IN DIFFERENT ERAS

Experience various historical timelines by playing different campaigns set in multiple dates. Adapt your strategies to each unique scenario and era.

DOWNLOAD NOW

Immerse yourself in the perfect fusion of humor and historical depth. Rally your nation, form alliances, and embark on a quest for global dominance in Countryball: World 1930. Shape the course of history one turn at a time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 / AMD FX-4100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 / NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 / AMD Radeon HD 5450 (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
